review: I mainly use it to stream Netflix, which works great!Don't have to connect my laptop/tablet/phone to the tv anymore,just cast it, and it will stream right through the dongle,and you're free to do other stuff on your pc/tablet/phone.It really needs to get more apps supporting this,including making it available for Windows devices as well.I just got a 2nd one.You can play on one TV, pause it and tell to start again on TV in a different room.Pretty handy!
author: Tim

review: Been waiting on this one for a while, and glad to say that it lived up to the hype.  Took about 10 minutes to setup using my iPhone.  Plugged right into an HDMI port on my projector, connected to power, and then used the iPhone app to actually setup the device.  Now I can stream Netflix straight to my projector and use the iPhone as essentially the remote to my TV.

review: I bought this to cast from my computer to my TV without having to hook my laptop to the tv. It is supposed to do that, but there are minimum system requirements needed which are not mentioned on the Amazon page. All is says is Windows 7 or 8, but it does not mention processor speed. Unless you have at least an intel core i3 processor it will not cast and stream at all. You need at least a core i5 3rd or 4th generation for high streaming quality.
